title: Rewriting the equations
text: The first step is to multiply the equation(s) by a number so that the coefficients of at least one of the variables is the same. This will make the equation easier to solve. Make sure you multiply all the terms in the equation by the same number.

title: Using substitution
text: The next step is to rewrite one of the equations in terms of one of the variables and plug it into the other equation.

title: Definition of inconsistent systems of equations
text: An inconsistent system of equations consists of parallel lines that never intersect. Algebraically, that means that the system of equation will result in a false equality.
